definition: bourgeois rightist faction (esp. during anti-rightist movement of 1957-58)
pinyin: zi1 chan3 jie1 ji2 you4 pai4

definition: bourgeois revolution (in Marx-Leninist theory, a prelude to the proletarian revolution)
pinyin: zi1 chan3 jie1 ji2 ge2 ming4

definition: social composition/social status (in Marxist theory, esp. using during the Cultural Revolution)

sentences.english: Either you believe in freedom and middle class trade policies or you dont.
sentences.chinese: 不管你信不信自由和中產階級貿易政策。

sentences.english: It attracted many thousands of visitors from all levels of society.
sentences.chinese: 水晶宮曾吸收了社會各階級的瞻仰者駐足欣賞。

sentences.english: One on offer . In India the poor, proportionately, are more likely to vote.
sentences.chinese: 按比例來說，印度的窮人比中產階級更樂於參加投票。

sentences.english: Each rank of the peerage was represented.
sentences.chinese: 每個貴族階級都有代表。

sentences.english: Stalks of grain, representing the peasant population, surround the gate.
sentences.chinese: 圍繞着天安門的稻穗代表了中國的農民階級。

sentences.english: I extend my greetings to the working class of our country.
sentences.chinese: 我要向我們國家的勞動階級致敬。

sentences.english: Industrial class conflict was a symptom of anomie .
sentences.chinese: 工業階級矛盾就是一種反常的症象。

sentences.english: Luring [A7] students back from foreign campuses constitutes China's new class struggle[A8] .
sentences.chinese: 因此，吸引海外學生歸囯成爲了中囯新的階級鬥爭。

sentences.english: The party was established to represent the interests of workers and trade unionists.
sentences.chinese: 工黨的成立宗旨是代表工人階級和行業工會的利益。

sentences.english: Illustrated under the direction of Robert Kretschmer (1818–1872), they met with wide approval from the educated bourgeoisie.
sentences.chinese: 它們獲得了資產階級教育界的廣泛認可。

sentences.english: So the term “middle class” covers a multitude of differences.
sentences.chinese: 因此，“中產階級”這個術語涵蓋了衆多的差異。

sentences.english: The banks tend to employ only white middle-class men.
sentences.chinese: 銀行總是隻招聘中產階級的白人男士。

sentences.english: It was a litany of middle-class lives shattered by the recession.
sentences.chinese: 這是中產階級因經濟蕭條而爲生活發出的祈禱。

sentences.english: The working class represents the CPC's strongest and most reliable class foundation.
sentences.chinese: 我國工人階級是我們黨最堅實最可靠的階級基礎。

sentences.english: The working class represents the CPC's strongest and most reliable class foundation.
sentences.chinese: 我國工人階級是我們黨最堅實最可靠的階級基礎。

sentences.english: The issues of race and class are separate and should not be conflated.
sentences.chinese: 種族與階級問題各不相關，不能混爲一談。
